name: Dive in the world of street food in Hue city
description:
Tour starts at 3 o’clock in the afternoon, we take you first to Dong
Ba Market. There will be a feast for your eyes and chance to eat like a local on
the pavement. We show you the best stuff, but if you want to try anything you
curiously spot on the way, feel free to stop and ask us to try. No extra
charge!
